mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT a.fid,a.billno,b.fentityId,b.structural_test,b.appearance_test,b.pack_test,b.sample_qty,b.qc_qualified_qty,b.qc_disqualified_qty,b.sample_disqualified_qty,b.sample_qualified_qty,b.bad_ratio,b.reexamination_num,b.avg_bad_ratio,b.rectify_type, b.structural_disqualifiedQty,b.appearance_disqualifiedQty,b.package_disqualifiedQty,b.remarks,b.is_check,b.submit_time,b.reverse_write FROM js_fgc_quality_check AS A LEFT JOIN js_fgc_quality_check_details AS B ON a.fid = b.fid WHERE b.is_check = '1' AND (reverse_Write != '1' OR reverse_write is null)
SELECT DISTINCT a.fid,a.billno,b.fentityId,b.reverse_write FROM js_fgc_quality_check AS A LEFT JOIN js_fgc_quality_check_details AS B ON a.fid = b.fid WHERE a.document_status = '完成'
